subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: In the not-too-distant future, Rutgers football fans may look back on Saturday’s game with Syracuse as another crossroads, because Coach Greg Schiano may be moving on.
snippet: In the not-too-distant future, Rutgers football fans may look back on Saturday’s game with Syracuse as another crossroads, because Coach Greg Schiano may be moving on.
